what: Set the USRDS working directory — set_USRDS_wd
title: Set the USRDS working directory — set_USRDS_wd
text: Sets USRDS working directory current session, optionally saves permanently user's .Renviron file environment variable USRDS_WD.

title: Set the USRDS working directory — set_USRDS_wd

text: path Path USRDS data folder permanent Logical; TRUE, appends setting .Renviron persistence

title: Set the USRDS working directory — set_USRDS_wd

code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ set_USRDS_wd("C:/Data/USRDS")          # Session only set_USRDS_wd("C:/Data/USRDS", TRUE)    # Persistent across sessions } # }
